2019-02-01.name: Eiga Korasho no Kaitei Wakuwaku Daibouken!

2019-02-03.name: Star Twinkle Precure
2019-02-03.desc:
The Starry Sky World, also known as planet Saman, is the home to the twelve Star Princesses who are based on the Zodiac Signs and maintain order in the universe. But when the Knot Raiders attack the Star Palace, princesses scatter themselves across the universe as the Princess Star Color Pens. Seeking to revive the princesses and avert the universe from being consumed in darkness, the aliens Lala and Prunus travel with the fairy Fuwa to Mihoshi Town on Earth where they meet the imaginative Hoshina Hikaru. Receiving a Star Color Pendant and one of the Star Color Pens, Hikaru transforms into the legendary PreCure, Cure Star. Joined by Lala and two other girls, Elena and Madoka, Hikaru leads the Star Twinkle PreCure as they seek to revive the Star Princesses and fight against the Knot Raiders.

Source: Wikipedia

2019-02-06.name: Wan Jie Shen Zhu
2019-02-06.desc:
The movie follows the bear brothers Briar and Bramble and their friend Vick on an accidental journey into the primitive age. On their search for the way back to the 21st century, they encounter all kinds of dangers and exotic animals like wild boars, giant turtles...and adorable pandas.

Source: Animation Magazine

2019-02-08.name: Gekijouban City Hunter: Shinjuku Private Eyes
2019-02-08.desc: A short video about moving in the future by transportation company Art Corporation.

2019-02-09.name: Code Geass: Fukkatsu no Lelouch
2019-02-09.desc:
The world was united under the reformed United Federation of Nations and enjoyed peaceful days. However, that peace suddenly comes to an end.

As Suzaku, disguised as the masked man Zero, was accompanying Nunnally on her visit to a refugee camp, he defeated by a mysterious KMF, and the two were taken away.

Kallen, Lloyd, and Sayokoinfiltrate Zilkstan Kingdom, the Land of Warriors, following a secret order from Schneizel; howver, they are attacked by a mysterious Geass user. They discovered C.C. there, whom the attacker referred to as the "Former Head (of the Geass Order)".

Does the Zilkstan Kingdom, the invincible kingdom that once defeated the army of Holy Britannian Empire, wish for hope or despair? It all comes down to the intention of C.C. and the people of Zilkstan royal palace... those who know about Geass.

Source: Mononoke-no-Ko Tumblr

2019-02-14.name: Fight League: Gear Gadget Generators
2019-02-14.desc:
Fight League... the ultimate battle that all fighters shoot for.

At this very moment, various brands are holding fiery preliminary battles for the right to participate in Fight League. One of the brands, GGG, is holding the GGG Cup, where fighters use their prized gadgets to win their way to the top. The key to victory is cooperation--"art chains"--between team mates.

A girl named G-Wrench, who wields her giant gadget effortlessly, is trying to lead her team, the Boltechs, in pursuit of that dream. But an encounter with a mysterious girl who appears in the middle of a match will change the destiny of G-Wrench, the Boltechs, and all of GGG!

Source: crunchyroll

2019-02-16.name: Beyond Creation
2019-02-16.desc: Note: A short animation produced by Live2D Creative Studio that shows the Live2D software capabilities.

2019-02-16.name: Gekijouban Oushitsu Kyoushi Heine
2019-02-16.desc:
The biggest threat to hit the Royal Kingdom?!

Under the guidance of the royal tutor Heine Wittgenstein, the four princes of the Glanzreich Kingdom, who aim to become the next king, have overcome various challenges and gradually grown up, while being confused sometimes. One day, the twin princes from the Romano Kingdom suddenly appear in front of them. Despite their cute looks, their true nature is super sadistic. To handle this unprecedented crisis, Heine and the four princes decide to teach them a lesson?!

Source: crunchyroll

2019-02-21.name: Kyou mo Tsuno ga Aru
2019-02-21.desc:
Final Fantasy XV: Episode Ardyn depicts the story of Ardyn Izunia, the main nemesis in FINAL FANTASY XV. The story of suffering, death, and resurrection leading up to the main story in FFXV. This animation reveals the story two millennia ago...

Source: crunchyroll
